Items.Title: Oversight - New York State Wetlands Protections: Implications for New York City.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - New York State Wetlands Protections: Implications for New York City.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to expeditiously enact the Clean Water Protection/Flood Prevention Act that would strengthen protection of wetlands in New York State and safeguard and enhance New York City’s water supply quality, pollution treatment, flood control, open space and natural areas.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Enact the Clean Water Protection/Flood Prevention Act.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to technical amendments to section 24-163.1 of such code.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Technical amendments to section 24-163.1 of such code.

Items.Title: Oversight - New York State Wetlands Protections: Implications for New York City.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - New York State Wetlands Protections: Implications for New York City.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to expeditiously enact the Clean Water Protection/Flood Prevention Act that would strengthen protection of wetlands in New York State and safeguard and enhance New York City’s water supply quality, pollution treatment, flood control, open space and natural areas.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Enact the Clean Water Protection/Flood Prevention Act.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to technical amendments to section 24-163.1 of such code.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Technical amendments to section 24-163.1 of such code.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the appropriate federal and state agencies, and the public, to provide all natural gas supply projects, including the proposed Broadwater Energy Project, a fair and full review, in light of the important role that natural gas is projected to play in enhancing the reliability of energy resources, increasing diversity of supply sources, reducing energy price volatility, and protecting environmental and public health in New York City.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Appropriate federal and state agencies, and the public, to provide all natural gas supply projects.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the appropriate federal and state agencies, and the public, to provide all natural gas supply projects, including the proposed Broadwater Energy Project, a fair and full review, in light of the important role that natural gas is projected to play in enhancing the reliability of energy resources, increasing diversity of supply sources, reducing energy price volatility, and protecting environmental and public health in New York City.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Appropriate federal and state agencies, and the public, to provide all natural gas supply projects.
